author: serge
msg: Much more optimized way of delivering messages.  Previously each message going out was creating a new javax.mail.Session object which is extremely expensive.  now instead one session object is created per delivery thread, and the properties are set per outgoing connection.  This is significantly more efficient.

author: serge
msg: Much more optimized way of parsing recipients each time from database.
